prompt.gameLog: Output from the latest launch will appear here
settings.label.useAdoptium: Use JRE downloads from Adoptium instead of the ones provided by Mojang
settings.label.useAdoptiumExplanation: The runtime downloads from Adoptium are generally more up-to-date than the ones Mojang provides
settings.label.alwaysPatchAuthlibExplana: Will reduce launch performance, but might be useful if you're experiencing weird issues when running Minecraft
settings.label.alwaysPatchMinecraftExpla: Will reduce launch performance, but might be useful if you're experiencing weird issues when running older Minecraft versions
settings.label.minimizeLauncher: Minimize launcher after starting the game
error.no-account-selected: You need to create an account first
